summary.span: 命名空间包含可用于扩展 SharePoint 项目部署过程的类型。

span.span: The namespace contains types that you can use to extend the deployment process for SharePoint projects.

summary.span: 有关使用此命名空间中类型的详细信息，请参阅[扩展 SharePoint 包和部署](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-sharepoint-packaging-and-deployment.md)。

span.span: For more information about using the types in this namespace, see [Extending SharePoint Packaging and Deployment](/visualstudio/sharepoint/extending-sharepoint-packaging-and-deployment.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然此命名空间中的类型的大多数都是接口，但是只有接口应在代码中实现。Although most of the types in this namespace are interfaces, only the interface is intended to be implemented in your code. 实现此接口可定义一个可在部署或撤消 SharePoint 项目项时执行的新部署步骤。Implement this interface to define a new deployment step that can be executed when a SharePoint project item is deployed or retracted. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 为 SharePoint 项目创建自定义部署步骤](/visualstudio/sharepoint/walkthrough-creating-a-custom-deployment-step-for-sharepoint-projects.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Creating a Custom Deployment Step for SharePoint Projects](/visualstudio/sharepoint/walkthrough-creating-a-custom-deployment-step-for-sharepoint-projects.md). 你还可以创建你自己的部署配置添加一个新的对象传递给SharePoint 项目的属性。You can also create your own deployment configuration by adding a new object to the property of a SharePoint project. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 为 SharePoint 项目创建自定义部署步骤](/visualstudio/sharepoint/walkthrough-creating-a-custom-deployment-step-for-sharepoint-projects.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Creating a Custom Deployment Step for SharePoint Projects](/visualstudio/sharepoint/walkthrough-creating-a-custom-deployment-step-for-sharepoint-projects.md).
